AI for 2048 Game

AI with Reliable Algorithms to win 2048 Game
Nov212014

2048 is a popular strategy game on multiple platforms. It developed by Gabriele Cirulli, a Italian young talent, which was built using HTML, CSS and JavaScript and was released as open-source software on Github.

The AI for 2048 game is designed to win the game with high probability. Now the project is still in progress. Warm welcome to contribute to the project together.

For details, you can visit the Github repository.
